Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Manager

  • public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    The Manager class is use as a Transaction Manager, it has the main methods needed to control transactions in the database.
    Author:
    Dongbo Xiao, Wenzhao Zang
